entry.title: SAP Cloud Connector Subaccount Certificate Automated Renewal has arrived!!
entry.content:
I wrote a Blog post some time ago (back in 2020!) in the #SAPCommunity about SAP BTP Cloud Connectivity issues due to expired certificates. The BTP Subaccount certificates needed to be regularly renewed - every 12 months in fact and it could only be carried out manually. While SAP provided information to customers about upcoming renewals (in later releases of the SAP Cloud Connector) with messages and Alerts within the SAP Cloud Connector - certificates that expired caused no end of trouble. This still causes a lot of issues for customers today. 

The previous blog post has reached over 60K views so you can see a fair number of customers experienced this issue. https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/sap-cloud-connectivity-issues-due-to-expired-certificate/ba-p/13431648

The goods news is - SAP released an update to the SAP Cloud Connector application to automate these renewals. Yes - you have read this correctly!  The update 2.18.0 was released in March 2025 and I only recently found out that this was possible. So if you have a previous version of the SAP Cloud Connector running then schedule an upgrade ASAP. I also wrote instructions for upgrading the Cloud Connector for Linux and Windows here -> https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/upgrading-the-sap-cloud-connector-for-linux-os/ba-p/13338502 and https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/upgrading-the-sap-cloud-connector-for-windows-os/ba-p/13314729

To automate the Subaccount certificate renewal process multiple steps are required. This involves the SAP Cloud Connector as well as the relevant BTP subaccount. SAP note 3632133 covers the steps required to automate the Subaccount certificate renewal but I will cover this now. Here are the steps to automate renewal of Subaccount certificates so you don't have to worry about this again! 

  1. To enable automatic renewal in the SAP Cloud Connector. 
    Make sure when setting up Subaccount connectivity within the SAP Cloud Connector to toggle the [Auto Renewal] and set to ON. For subaccounts that are already set up just Edit the connection. 

2. To enable Auto Renewal in SAP BTP Cockpit:

  1. Log in to the SAP BTP Cockpit;
  2. Go to the respective Subaccount > Connectivity > "Cloud Connectors";
  3. Enable the "Allow Automatic Subaccount Certificate Refresh" toggle.

     

    As per the note, this is how the renewal works. 
     

    How Renewal Works

    • The renewal is triggered n + 7 days before certificate expiry, where n is the alert threshold (configurable in Observation Configuration -> Alerting);
    • If the renewal attempt fails, it is retried every 12 hours; If not successful within 7 days, the automatic renewal is cancelled.
    • No user credentials are involved in the automatic renewal of a BTP subaccount certificate. The authentication is handled by the currently valid subaccount certificate, provided that an administrator has enabled the auto-renewal feature for the subaccount on the BTP side too.

So, if the above instructions are followed you should not experience issues with Cloud connectivity again! 

The other good news is that this was submitted as an improvement request via the Customer influence engagement portal. In retrospect I wrote a blog post about it but did not submit a customer engagement initiative request to make an improvement but good to see others did. 54 others also voted for it. 5 years is also too long for this to be delivered given the amount of issues this caused for a lot of the customers I work with on a daily basis but glad that SAP has delivered this now. 

https://influence.sap.com/sap/ino/#/idea/251489/?section=sectionDetails

Overall, I am really happy that SAP has delivered this functionality and I really hope customers plan to do upgrades to the SAP Cloud Connector to take advantage of this update ASAP. 

As always, thanks for reading and hopefully this helps!

entry.title: Sharing Custom Function Module ZPOPUP_TO_GET_ONE_VALUE for Simple User Input
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community! üëã

Today I‚Äôd like to share a small but useful development I recently created ‚Äî a reusable function module that displays a popup to collect a single value entered by the user.

The idea was to create a lightweight and generic solution to obtain user input through a popup, similar to some standard dialogs but fully customizable and easy to reuse across different programs and languages.

The function module was implemented in the standard function group SPO3, and I created a custom screen 101 specifically for this purpose. The screen contains a single input field and standard OK/Cancel buttons, providing a very simple user interaction.  Also, to allow the user to select a date using the standard SAP Calendar, I added the search help BU_DATE_CHAR to the input field.

Final Result:

Sample Code:

FUNCTION ZPOPUP_TO_GET_ONE_VALUE.
*"----------------------------------------------------------------------
*"*"Interface local:
*"  EXPORTING
*"     VALUE(ANSWER)
*"     VALUE(VALUE1) TYPE  BAPI2017_GM_HEAD_01-PSTNG_DATE
*"  EXCEPTIONS
*"      TITEL_TOO_LONG
*"----------------------------------------------------------------------

  ANSWER = 'J'.

  IF sy-langu = 'P'.
    MOVE 'Confirma√ß√£o' TO GL_TITEL.
  ELSEIF sy-langu = 'E'.
    MOVE 'Confirmation' TO GL_TITEL.
  ELSEIF sy-langu = 'D'.
    MOVE 'Best√§tigung' TO GL_TITEL.
  ELSEIF sy-langu = 'S'.
    MOVE 'Confirmaci√≥n' TO GL_TITEL.
  ELSEIF sy-langu = 'F'.
    MOVE 'Confirmation' TO GL_TITEL.
  ENDIF.

  CLEAR SPOP-VARVALUE1.

  CALL SCREEN 101 STARTING AT 25  6
                  ENDING   AT 90 8.

  VALUE1 = SPOP-VARVALUE1.
  ANSWER = ANTWORT.

ENDFUNCTION.

General Attribute List of the Elements on Screen 101: 

This small development provides a straightforward method to collect a single user input without repeatedly building a full dynpro from scratch. If you have suggestions for improvements or alternative approaches, I‚Äôd be happy to hear your thoughts!

Thanks for reading! üëã

entry.title: Custom Development: Program for Mass Creation of Purchase Requisitions
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community! üëã

Today I‚Äôd like to share a custom ABAP Development that I created to simplify and automate a very common operational need: the mass creation of Purchase Requisitions (PRs).

In many organizations, users frequently need to create large volumes of PRs based on spreadsheets, external data, or recurring patterns. Doing this manually through ME51N can be time-consuming, error-prone, and inefficient.

To address this, I developed a standalone program that reads structured input data and automatically creates PRs in bulk, providing clear logs and validation checks.

Report ZMM_LOG_PG03:

REPORT zmm_log_pg03.

INCLUDE:
  zmm_log_pg03_top,
  zmm_log_pg03_lcl,
  zmm_log_pg03_scr,
  zmm_log_pg03_f01.

Include ZMM_LOG_PG03_TOP:

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Include          ZMM_LOG_PG01_TOP
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*


TYPES:
  BEGIN OF gtyp_post.
    INCLUDE TYPE zmm_log_st03.
TYPES:
    bsart TYPE bbsrt,
    knttp TYPE knttp,
    ernam TYPE ernam,
    kostl TYPE kostl,
    ekorg TYPE ekorg,
    ekgrp TYPE ekgrp,
  END OF gtyp_post,
  BEGIN OF gtyp_imp_exp,
    matnr	TYPE matnr,
    menge	TYPE char16,
    werks	TYPE werks_d,
    lgort	TYPE lgort_d,
    lfdat	TYPE char10,
    flief	TYPE flief,
  END OF gtyp_imp_exp,
  BEGIN OF gtyp_imp_exp_ini,
    matnr	TYPE string,
    menge	TYPE string,
    werks	TYPE string,
    lgort	TYPE string,
    lfdat	TYPE string,
    flief	TYPE string,
  END OF gtyp_imp_exp_ini,
  BEGIN OF gtyp_num_errors,
    index TYPE sytabix,
    value TYPE char20,
  END OF gtyp_num_errors,
  BEGIN OF gtyp_date_errors,
    index TYPE sytabix,
    value TYPE char20,
  END OF gtyp_date_errors.


CONSTANTS:
  gc_matkl TYPE rvari_vnam VALUE 'ZMMPURREQ_MATGROUP'.

CLASS: lcl_eventhandler DEFINITION DEFERRED.

DATA:
  BEGIN: OF gt_excl OCCURS 0,
    code TYPE syst_ucomm,
  END OF gt_excl.

DATA:
  gt_out             TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF zmm_log_st03,
  gt_out_ini         TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF zmm_log_st03,
  gs_out             TYPE zmm_log_st03,
  gt_post            TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF gtyp_post,
  gs_post            TYPE gtyp_post,
  gt_import          TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF gtyp_imp_exp,
  gt_num_errors      TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF gtyp_num_errors WITH KEY index,
  gs_num_errors      TYPE gtyp_num_errors,
  gt_date_errors     TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF gtyp_date_errors WITH KEY index,
  gs_date_errors     TYPE gtyp_date_errors,
  gt_protocol_import TYPE lvc_t_msg1,
  gt_rows            TYPE lvc_t_row,
  gs_rows            TYPE lvc_s_row,
  gr_matkl           TYPE RANGE OF matkl,
  gs_matkl           LIKE LINE OF gr_matkl,
  go_container       TYPE REF TO cl_gui_custom_container,
  go_alv             TYPE REF TO cl_gui_alv_grid,
  go_events          TYPE REF TO lcl_eventhandler,
  gv_answer          TYPE char1,
  gv_import          TYPE xfeld,
  gv_progress        TYPE xfeld,
  gv_errors          TYPE xfeld,
  gv_rows            TYPE int4,
  gv_selall          TYPE xfeld.

Include ZMM_LOG_PG03_LCL:

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Include          ZMM_LOG_PG01_LCL
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*

CLASS lcl_eventhandler DEFINITION.

  PUBLIC SECTION.

    CLASS-METHODS:

      handle_data_changed FOR EVENT data_changed OF cl_gui_alv_grid
        IMPORTING
          er_data_changed.


ENDCLASS.                    "lcl_eventhandler DEFINITION

*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*       CLASS lcl_eventhandler IMPLEMENTATION
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*
*---------------------------------------------------------------------*
CLASS lcl_eventhandler IMPLEMENTATION.

  METHOD handle_data_changed.

    CONSTANTS:
      lv_tabname TYPE tabname VALUE 'ZMM_LOG_ST03'.

    FIELD-SYMBOLS:
      <lfs_value>         TYPE any,
      <lfs_value_o>       TYPE any,
      <lv_value_ref>      TYPE any,
      <lfs_ls_add_fields> TYPE dcfielddat.

    DATA:
      lo_data_changed    TYPE REF TO cl_alv_changed_data_protocol,
      lo_struct          TYPE REF TO cl_abap_structdescr,
      lr_data            TYPE REF TO data,
      lt_comp            TYPE abap_component_tab,
      ls_comp            TYPE abap_componentdescr,
      ls_protocol_import TYPE lvc_s_msg1,
      lt_failure         TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ddfkeyrc,
      ls_failure         TYPE ddfkeyrc,
      lt_add_fields      TYPE dcfielddats,
      ls_good_cell       TYPE lvc_s_modi,
      ls_mod_cell        TYPE lvc_s_modi,
      ls_mod_cell2       TYPE lvc_s_modi,
      ls_mod_cell_add    TYPE lvc_s_modi,
      lv_value           TYPE lvc_value,
      lv_value_o         TYPE lvc_value,
      ls_out             TYPE zmm_log_st03,
      lv_row_id          TYPE int4,
      lv_fieldn	         TYPE lvc_fname,
      lv_fieldname       TYPE fnam_____4,
      ls_syst            TYPE syst,
      lv_msgno           TYPE symsgno,
      lv_msgv1           TYPE char120,
      lv_msgv2           TYPE char120,
      lv_msgv3           TYPE char120,
      lv_proc_f          TYPE f,
      lv_proc            TYPE sy-tabix,
      lv_werks           TYPE werks_d,
      lv_lgort           TYPE lgort_d,
      lv_matnr           TYPE matnr,
      lv_mmsta           TYPE mmsta,
      lv_lifnr           TYPE lifnr,
      lv_datbi           TYPE datbi,
      lv_lines           TYPE i,
      lv_date_format(15) TYPE c.


    IF er_data_changed IS NOT BOUND.
      EXIT.
    ENDIF.

    IF gv_import IS NOT INITIAL.

      FREE: er_data_changed->mt_mod_cells.

      lo_struct ?= cl_abap_typedescr=>describe_by_data( ls_out ).
      lt_comp = lo_struct->get_components( ).

      LOOP AT gt_out INTO ls_out.
        lv_row_id = sy-tabix.
        LOOP AT lt_comp INTO ls_comp.
          lv_fieldn = ls_comp-name.
          ASSIGN COMPONENT lv_fieldn OF STRUCTURE ls_out TO <lfs_value_o>.
          IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL AND <lfs_value_o> IS ASSIGNED.
            er_data_changed->modify_cell(
              i_row_id    = lv_row_id
              i_tabix     = lv_row_id
              i_fieldname = lv_fieldn
              i_value     = <lfs_value_o>
            ).
            UNASSIGN <lfs_value_o>.
          ENDIF.
        ENDLOOP.
      ENDLOOP.

      gt_protocol_import = er_data_changed->mt_protocol.

    ELSE.

      LOOP AT er_data_changed->mt_mod_cells INTO ls_mod_cell.
        DELETE gt_protocol_import WHERE row_id = ls_mod_cell-row_id AND fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname.
      ENDLOOP.
      FREE: er_data_changed->mt_protocol.
      CALL METHOD er_data_changed->refresh_protocol.
      LOOP AT gt_protocol_import INTO ls_protocol_import.
        CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
          EXPORTING
            i_msgid     = ls_protocol_import-msgid
            i_msgty     = ls_protocol_import-msgty
            i_msgno     = ls_protocol_import-msgno
            i_msgv1     = ls_protocol_import-msgv1
            i_msgv2     = ls_protocol_import-msgv2
            i_msgv3     = ls_protocol_import-msgv3
            i_msgv4     = ls_protocol_import-msgv4
            i_fieldname = ls_protocol_import-fieldname
            i_row_id    = ls_protocol_import-row_id.
      ENDLOOP.


    ENDIF.


    DESCRIBE TABLE er_data_changed->mt_mod_cells LINES lv_lines.

    LOOP AT er_data_changed->mt_mod_cells INTO ls_mod_cell.

      READ TABLE gt_out INTO ls_out INDEX  ls_mod_cell-row_id.

      lv_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname.
      IF gv_import IS NOT INITIAL.
        ASSIGN COMPONENT lv_fieldname OF STRUCTURE ls_out TO <lfs_value_o>.
        lv_value_o = <lfs_value_o>.

* EXT_DMSF (23/09/2025) - START

        lv_msgv2 = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
        SHIFT lv_msgv2 LEFT DELETING LEADING space.

        IF lv_value_o = '' AND lv_fieldname = 'MATNR'.
          CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
          EXPORTING
            i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
            i_msgty     = 'E'
            i_msgno     = '197'
            i_msgv1     = lv_msgv2
            i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
            i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
        ELSEIF lv_fieldname = 'MENGE'.
          SHIFT lv_value_o LEFT DELETING LEADING space.
          IF lv_value_o = '' OR lv_value_o = '0.000'.
          CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
          EXPORTING
            i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
            i_msgty     = 'E'
            i_msgno     = '198'
            i_msgv1     = lv_msgv2
            i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
            i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
          ENDIF.
        ELSEIF lv_value_o = '' AND lv_fieldname = 'WERKS'.
          CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
          EXPORTING
            i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
            i_msgty     = 'E'
            i_msgno     = '199'
            i_msgv1     = lv_msgv2
            i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
            i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
        ELSEIF lv_value_o = '' AND lv_fieldname = 'LGORT'.
          CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
          EXPORTING
            i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
            i_msgty     = 'E'
            i_msgno     = '200'
            i_msgv1     = lv_msgv2
            i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
            i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
        ELSEIF lv_value_o = '' AND lv_fieldname = 'LFDAT'.
          CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
          EXPORTING
            i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
            i_msgty     = 'E'
            i_msgno     = '201'
            i_msgv1     = lv_msgv2
            i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
            i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
        ELSEIF lv_value_o = '' AND lv_fieldname = 'FLIEF'.
          CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
          EXPORTING
            i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
            i_msgty     = 'E'
            i_msgno     = '202'
            i_msgv1     = lv_msgv2
            i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
            i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
        ENDIF.

* END

      ELSE.
        lv_value_o = ls_mod_cell-value.
      ENDIF.

      FREE: gs_post.
      READ TABLE gt_post INTO gs_post INDEX ls_mod_cell-row_id.


      CASE ls_mod_cell-fieldname.
        WHEN 'MATNR' OR 'WERKS' OR 'LGORT'.
          FREE: lt_failure, lt_add_fields.
          IF ls_mod_cell-fieldname = 'MATNR'.
            CALL FUNCTION 'CONVERSION_EXIT_MATN1_INPUT'
              EXPORTING
                input         = lv_value_o
              IMPORTING
                output        = lv_value_o.
          ENDIF.
          CALL FUNCTION 'DDUT_INPUT_CHECK'
            EXPORTING
              tabname           = lv_tabname
              fieldname         = lv_fieldname
              value             = lv_value_o
            TABLES
              failure_tab       = lt_failure
            CHANGING
              additional_fields = lt_add_fields
            EXCEPTIONS
              no_ddic_field     = 1
              illegal_move      = 2
              OTHERS            = 3.
          IF lt_add_fields IS NOT INITIAL.
            LOOP AT lt_add_fields ASSIGNING <lfs_ls_add_fields>.
              ASSIGN COMPONENT <lfs_ls_add_fields>-fieldname OF STRUCTURE ls_out TO <lfs_value>.
              IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL AND <lfs_value> IS ASSIGNED.
                ASSIGN <lfs_ls_add_fields>-value->* TO <lv_value_ref>.
                IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL AND <lv_value_ref> IS ASSIGNED.
                  ASSIGN <lfs_ls_add_fields>-value->* TO <lv_value_ref>.
                  <lv_value_ref> =  <lfs_value>.
                  <lfs_ls_add_fields>-found =  abap_true.
                  UNASSIGN <lv_value_ref>.
                ENDIF.
                UNASSIGN <lfs_value>.
              ENDIF.
            ENDLOOP.
            REFRESH: lt_failure.
            CALL FUNCTION 'DDUT_INPUT_CHECK'
              EXPORTING
                tabname           = lv_tabname
                fieldname         = lv_fieldname
                value             = lv_value_o
              TABLES
                failure_tab       = lt_failure
              CHANGING
                additional_fields = lt_add_fields
              EXCEPTIONS
                no_ddic_field     = 1
                illegal_move      = 2
                OTHERS            = 3.
          ENDIF.
          IF lt_failure IS NOT INITIAL.
            LOOP AT lt_failure INTO ls_failure.
              ls_failure-arbgb = 'ZMM'.
              lv_msgno = ls_failure-msgnr.
              IF ls_mod_cell-fieldname = 'WERKS'.
                lv_msgno = 184.
                ls_failure-msgv2 = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
                SHIFT ls_failure-msgv2 LEFT DELETING LEADING space.
              ELSEIF ls_mod_cell-fieldname = 'LGORT'.
                lv_msgno = 185.
                ls_failure-msgv1 = ls_out-lgort.
                ls_failure-msgv2 = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
                SHIFT ls_failure-msgv2 LEFT DELETING LEADING space.
                ls_failure-msgv3 = ls_out-werks.
              ELSEIF ls_mod_cell-fieldname = 'MATNR'.
                lv_msgno = 181.
                ls_failure-msgv2 = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
                SHIFT ls_failure-msgv2 LEFT DELETING LEADING space.
                ls_failure-msgv3 = lv_werks.
                ls_failure-msgv4 = ls_out-lgort.
              ENDIF.
              CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
                EXPORTING
                  i_msgid     = ls_failure-arbgb
                  i_msgty     = ls_failure-msgty
                  i_msgno     = lv_msgno
                  i_msgv1     = ls_failure-msgv1
                  i_msgv2     = ls_failure-msgv2
                  i_msgv3     = ls_failure-msgv3
                  i_msgv4     = ls_failure-msgv4
                  i_fieldname = ls_failure-fieldname
                  i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
            ENDLOOP.
          ELSE.
            IF ls_mod_cell-fieldname = 'MATNR'.

              SELECT SINGLE matnr
                  FROM mara
                 WHERE matnr = @LV_value_o
                  INTO @LV_matnr.
              IF sy-subrc IS NOT INITIAL.
                lv_msgv2 = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
                SHIFT lv_msgv2 LEFT DELETING LEADING space.
                CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
                  EXPORTING
                    i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
                    i_msgty     = 'E'
                    i_msgno     = 179
                    i_msgv1     = lv_value_o
                    i_msgv2     = lv_msgv2
                    i_msgv3     = lv_werks
                    i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
                    i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
              ENDIF.

              SELECT SINGLE matnr
                  FROM mara
                 WHERE matnr = @LV_value_o
                   AND matkl IN @GR_matkl
                  INTO @LV_matnr.
              IF sy-subrc IS NOT INITIAL.
                lv_msgv2 = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
                READ TABLE gr_matkl INTO gs_matkl INDEX 1.
                IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
                  lv_msgv3 = gs_matkl-low.
                ENDIF.
                SHIFT lv_msgv2 LEFT DELETING LEADING space.
                CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
                  EXPORTING
                    i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
                    i_msgty     = 'E'
                    i_msgno     = 180
                    i_msgv1     = lv_value_o
                    i_msgv2     = lv_msgv2
                    i_msgv3     = lv_msgv3
                    i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
                    i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
              ENDIF.

              lv_werks = ls_out-werks.
              IF lv_value_o IS NOT INITIAL AND lv_werks IS NOT INITIAL.
                SELECT SINGLE mmsta
                  FROM marc
                 WHERE matnr = @LV_value_o
                   AND werks = @LV_werks
                   AND mmsta IS INITIAL
                  INTO @LV_mmsta.
                IF sy-subrc IS NOT INITIAL.
                  lv_msgv2 = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
                  SHIFT lv_msgv2 LEFT DELETING LEADING space.
                  CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
                    EXPORTING
                      i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
                      i_msgty     = 'E'
                      i_msgno     = 182
                      i_msgv1     = lv_value_o
                      i_msgv2     = lv_msgv2
                      i_msgv3     = lv_werks
                      i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
                      i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
                ENDIF.
              ENDIF.
            ENDIF.

          ENDIF.


          IF ls_mod_cell-fieldname = 'MATNR'.
            FREE: lv_value.
            SELECT SINGLE maktx
              INTO lv_value
              FROM makt
             WHERE matnr = lv_value_o
               AND spras = sy-langu.
            er_data_changed->modify_cell(
              i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id
              i_fieldname = 'MAKTX'
              i_value     = lv_value
            ).


            IF gs_post-bsart IS INITIAL.
              CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
                EXPORTING
                  i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
                  i_msgty     = 'E'
                  i_msgno     = 188
                  i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
                  i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
            ENDIF.

            IF gs_post-knttp IS INITIAL.
              CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
                EXPORTING
                  i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
                  i_msgty     = 'E'
                  i_msgno     = 189
                  i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
                  i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
            ENDIF.

            IF gs_post-ekorg IS INITIAL OR gs_post-ekgrp IS INITIAL.
              CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
                EXPORTING
                  i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
                  i_msgty     = 'E'
                  i_msgno     = 191
                  i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
                  i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
            ENDIF.


*                bsart TYPE bbsrt,
*    knttp TYPE knttp,
*    ernam TYPE ernam,
*    kostl TYPE kostl,
*    ekorg TYPE ekorg,
*    ekgrp TYPE ekgrp,
          ENDIF.


        WHEN 'LFDAT'.
          READ TABLE gt_date_errors WITH KEY index = ls_mod_cell-row_id
                                    TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS.
          IF sy-subrc IS NOT INITIAL.
*            IF ls_mod_cell-value <> sy-datum.
            IF lv_value_o <> sy-datum. " EXT_DMSF (26/09/2025)
              WRITE ls_mod_cell-row_id TO lv_msgv1 LEFT-JUSTIFIED.
              CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
                EXPORTING
                  i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
                  i_msgty     = 'W'
                  i_msgno     = 192
                  i_msgv1     = lv_msgv1
                  i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
                  i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
            ENDIF.
          ENDIF.

        WHEN 'FLIEF'.
          UNPACK lv_value_o TO lv_lifnr.
          SELECT SINGLE lifnr
            INTO lv_lifnr
            FROM lfm1
           WHERE lifnr = lv_lifnr
             AND ekorg = gs_post-ekorg.
          IF sy-subrc IS NOT INITIAL.
            lv_msgv2 = gs_post-ekorg.
            CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
              EXPORTING
                i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
                i_msgty     = 'E'
                i_msgno     = 187
                i_msgv1     = lv_value_o
                i_msgv2     = lv_msgv2
                i_fieldname = ls_mod_cell-fieldname
                i_row_id    = ls_mod_cell-row_id.
          ENDIF.

      ENDCASE.

    ENDLOOP.

    IF gv_import IS NOT INITIAL AND gt_num_errors IS NOT INITIAL.
      LOOP AT gt_num_errors INTO gs_num_errors.
        WRITE gs_num_errors-value TO lv_msgv1 LEFT-JUSTIFIED.
        WRITE gs_num_errors-index TO lv_msgv2 LEFT-JUSTIFIED.
        CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
          EXPORTING
            i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
            i_msgty     = 'E'
            i_msgno     = 183
            i_msgv1     = lv_msgv1
            i_msgv2     = lv_msgv2
            i_fieldname = 'MENGE'
            i_row_id    = gs_num_errors-index.
*        er_data_changed->modify_cell(
*          i_row_id    = gs_num_errors-index
*          i_fieldname = 'MENGE'
*          i_value     = gs_num_errors-value
*        ).
      ENDLOOP.
      FREE: gt_num_errors.
    ENDIF.

    IF gv_import IS NOT INITIAL AND gt_date_errors IS NOT INITIAL.
      LOOP AT gt_date_errors INTO gs_date_errors.
        WRITE gs_date_errors-value TO lv_msgv1 LEFT-JUSTIFIED.
        WRITE gs_date_errors-index TO lv_msgv2 LEFT-JUSTIFIED.
        CALL METHOD er_data_changed->add_protocol_entry
          EXPORTING
            i_msgid     = 'ZMM'
            i_msgty     = 'E'
            i_msgno     = 186
            i_msgv1     = lv_msgv1
            i_msgv2     = lv_msgv2
            i_fieldname = 'LFDAT'
            i_row_id    = gs_date_errors-index.
        er_data_changed->modify_cell(
          i_row_id    = gs_date_errors-index
          i_fieldname = 'LFDAT'
          i_value     = gs_date_errors-value
        ).
      ENDLOOP.
      FREE: gt_date_errors.
    ENDIF.


    CALL METHOD er_data_changed->display_protocol.

    IF gv_import IS NOT INITIAL.
      FREE: gv_import.
      gt_protocol_import = er_data_changed->mt_protocol.
      CALL METHOD go_alv->refresh_table_display.
    ENDIF.
    FREE: gv_progress.

    IF er_data_changed->mt_protocol IS INITIAL.
      FREE: gv_errors.
    ELSE.
      READ TABLE er_data_changed->mt_protocol WITH KEY msgty = 'E'
                                              TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS.
      IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
        gv_errors = abap_true.
      ELSE.
        FREE: gv_errors.
      ENDIF.
    ENDIF.

  ENDMETHOD.

ENDCLASS.                    "lcl_eventhandler IMPLEMENTATION

Include ZMM_LOG_PG03_F01:

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Include          ZMM_LOG_PG01_F01
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*


*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*&      Form  F_CREATE_ALV_OBJECT
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM f_create_alv_object .

  CREATE OBJECT go_alv
    EXPORTING
      i_parent = go_container.

*  TRY .
*      cl_salv_table=>factory(
*        EXPORTING
*          r_container  = go_container
*        IMPORTING
*          r_salv_table = go_alv
*        CHANGING
*          t_table      = gt_out
*      ).
*
*    CATCH cx_salv_msg INTO gx_salv_msg.
*      gv_error_message = gx_salv_msg->get_text( ).
*      WRITE gv_error_message.
*  ENDTRY.

ENDFORM.                    " F_CREATE_ALV_OBJECT


*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*&      Form  F_ALV_DISPLAY
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------**
FORM f_alv_display .

  DATA:
    lo_tabledescr TYPE REF TO cl_abap_structdescr,
    lo_data       TYPE REF TO data,
    lt_dfies      TYPE ddfields,
    ls_dfies      TYPE dfies,
    ls_layout     TYPE lvc_s_layo,
    lt_exclude    TYPE ui_functions,
    ls_exclude    TYPE ui_func,
    lt_fieldcat   TYPE lvc_t_fcat,
    ls_fieldcat   TYPE lvc_s_fcat,
    lt_dropdown   TYPE lvc_t_drop,
    ls_dropdown   TYPE lvc_s_drop,
    ls_color      TYPE lvc_s_colo.

  CREATE OBJECT go_container
    EXPORTING
      container_name = 'CONTAINER'.

  CREATE OBJECT go_alv
    EXPORTING
      i_parent = go_container.

  FREE: lt_fieldcat.
  CREATE DATA lo_data LIKE LINE OF gt_out.
  lo_tabledescr ?= cl_abap_structdescr=>describe_by_data_ref( lo_data ).
  lt_dfies = cl_salv_data_descr=>read_structdescr( lo_tabledescr ).
  LOOP AT lt_dfies INTO ls_dfies.
    FREE: ls_fieldcat.
    MOVE-CORRESPONDING ls_dfies TO ls_fieldcat.
    CASE ls_fieldcat-fieldname.
      WHEN 'MANDT'.
        CONTINUE.
      WHEN 'MATNR'.
        ls_fieldcat-key = abap_true.
        ls_fieldcat-outputlen = 24.
      WHEN 'MENGE'.
        ls_fieldcat-outputlen = 16.
      WHEN 'WERKS'.
        ls_fieldcat-outputlen = 8.
      WHEN 'LGORT'.
        ls_fieldcat-outputlen = 8.
      WHEN 'LFDAT'.
        ls_fieldcat-outputlen = 14.
      WHEN 'FLIEF'.
        ls_fieldcat-outputlen = 20.
    ENDCASE.
    APPEND ls_fieldcat TO lt_fieldcat.
  ENDLOOP.

*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Form f_uploaad
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM f_upload .

  TYPES:
    BEGIN OF ltyp_matkl_prdha,
      matnr TYPE matnr,
      matkl TYPE matkl,
      prdha TYPE prodh_d,
    END OF ltyp_matkl_prdha.

  FIELD-SYMBOLS:
    <lfs_out> LIKE LINE OF gt_out.

  DATA:
    lt_import      TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF gtyp_imp_exp,
    ls_import      TYPE gtyp_imp_exp,
    ls_import_ini  TYPE gtyp_imp_exp_ini,
    lt_filetable   TYPE filetable,
    ls_filetable   TYPE file_table,
    lt_csv         TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF string,
    ls_csv         TYPE string,
    lt_assign      TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF v_t001k_assign WITH NON-UNIQUE KEY werks,
    ls_assign      TYPE v_t001k_assign,
    lt_ta_01       TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF zmm_ariba_ta_01 WITH NON-UNIQUE KEY bukrs,
    ls_ta_01       TYPE zmm_ariba_ta_01,
    lt_ta_03       TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF zmm_ariba_ta_03 WITH NON-UNIQUE KEY werks lgort,
    ls_ta_03       TYPE zmm_ariba_ta_03,
    lt_ta_12       TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF zmm_ariba_ta_12 WITH NON-UNIQUE KEY bukrs werks,
    ls_ta_12       TYPE zmm_ariba_ta_12,
    lt_consumos    TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF zmm_consumos WITH NON-UNIQUE KEY werks lgort,
    ls_consumos    TYPE zmm_consumos,
    lt_matkl_prdha TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ltyp_matkl_prdha WITH NON-UNIQUE KEY matnr,
    ls_matkl_prdha TYPE ltyp_matkl_prdha,
    lv_prdha       TYPE prodh_d,
    lv_filename    TYPE string,
    lv_rows        TYPE int4,
    lv_tabix       TYPE sytabix,
    lv_rc          TYPE i.

  FREE: gt_out.
  CALL METHOD go_alv->refresh_table_display.

  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>file_open_dialog
    EXPORTING
      window_title            = 'Importar CSV'
      default_extension       = 'CSV'
      default_filename        = '*.CSV'
      file_filter             = '*.CSV'
      multiselection          = abap_false
    CHANGING
      file_table              = lt_filetable
      rc                      = lv_rc
    EXCEPTIONS
      file_open_dialog_failed = 1
      cntl_error              = 2
      error_no_gui            = 3
      not_supported_by_gui    = 4
      OTHERS                  = 5.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
    FREE: lt_filetable.
  ENDIF.



  IF lt_filetable IS NOT INITIAL.
    READ TABLE lt_filetable INTO ls_filetable INDEX 1.
    lv_filename = ls_filetable.
    CALL FUNCTION 'GUI_UPLOAD'
      EXPORTING
        filename                = lv_filename
        filetype                = 'ASC'
        has_field_separator     = abap_true
        read_by_line            = 'X'
      TABLES
        data_tab                = lt_csv
      EXCEPTIONS
        file_open_error         = 1
        file_read_error         = 2
        no_batch                = 3
        gui_refuse_filetransfer = 4
        invalid_type            = 5
        no_authority            = 6
        unknown_error           = 7
        bad_data_format         = 8
        header_not_allowed      = 9
        separator_not_allowed   = 10
        header_too_long         = 11
        unknown_dp_error        = 12
        access_denied           = 13
        dp_out_of_memory        = 14
        disk_full               = 15
        dp_timeout              = 16
        OTHERS                  = 17.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
      EXIT.
    ENDIF.


    FREE: lt_import.
    LOOP AT lt_csv INTO ls_csv.
      FREE: ls_import, ls_import_ini.
      IF sy-tabix = 1.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.
      lv_tabix = sy-tabix - 1.
      SPLIT ls_csv AT ';' INTO ls_import_ini-matnr ls_import_ini-menge ls_import_ini-werks
                               ls_import_ini-lgort ls_import_ini-lfdat ls_import_ini-flief.

      IF strlen( ls_import_ini-matnr ) > 18.
        ls_import-matnr = ls_import_ini-matnr(18).
      ELSE.
        ls_import-matnr = ls_import_ini-matnr.
      ENDIF.
      IF strlen( ls_import_ini-menge ) > 16.
        ls_import-menge = ls_import_ini-menge(16).
      ELSE.
        ls_import-menge = ls_import_ini-menge.
      ENDIF.
      IF strlen( ls_import_ini-werks ) > 4.
        ls_import-werks = ls_import_ini-werks(4).
      ELSE.
        ls_import-werks = ls_import_ini-werks.
      ENDIF.
      IF strlen( ls_import_ini-lgort ) > 4.
        ls_import-lgort = ls_import_ini-lgort(4).
      ELSE.
        ls_import-lgort = ls_import_ini-lgort.
      ENDIF.
      IF strlen( ls_import_ini-lfdat ) > 10.
        ls_import_ini-lfdat = ls_import_ini-lfdat(10).
      ENDIF.
      IF strlen( ls_import_ini-flief ) > 10.
        ls_import-flief = ls_import_ini-flief(10).
      ELSE.
        ls_import-flief = ls_import_ini-flief.
      ENDIF.
      TRANSLATE ls_import-menge  USING ',.'.
      IF zcl_mm_generic=>check_numeric( ls_import-menge ) IS NOT INITIAL.
        FREE: gs_num_errors.
        gs_num_errors-index = lv_tabix.
        gs_num_errors-value = ls_import_ini-menge.
        APPEND gs_num_errors TO gt_num_errors.
        FREE: ls_import-menge.
      ENDIF.
      IF ls_import_ini-lfdat IS INITIAL.
        FREE: gs_date_errors, ls_import-lfdat.
        gs_date_errors-index = lv_tabix.
        gs_date_errors-value = ls_import_ini-lfdat.
        APPEND gs_date_errors TO gt_date_errors.
      ELSEIF zcl_mm_generic=>check_date( ls_import_ini-lfdat ) IS INITIAL.
        CALL FUNCTION 'CONVERT_DATE_TO_INTERNAL'
          EXPORTING
            date_external            = ls_import_ini-lfdat
*           ACCEPT_INITIAL_DATE      =
          IMPORTING
            date_internal            = ls_import-lfdat
          EXCEPTIONS
            date_external_is_invalid = 1
            OTHERS                   = 2.
        IF sy-subrc <> 0.
          FREE: ls_import-lfdat.
          FREE: gs_date_errors, ls_import-lfdat.
          gs_date_errors-index = lv_tabix.
          gs_date_errors-value = ls_import_ini-lfdat.
          APPEND gs_date_errors TO gt_date_errors.
        ENDIF.
      ELSE.
        FREE: ls_import-lfdat.
        FREE: gs_date_errors, ls_import-lfdat.
        gs_date_errors-index = lv_tabix.
        gs_date_errors-value = ls_import_ini-lfdat.
        APPEND gs_date_errors TO gt_date_errors.
      ENDIF.
      APPEND ls_import TO lt_import.
    ENDLOOP.


    FREE: gt_out.
    CALL METHOD go_alv->refresh_table_display.

    gt_out = CORRESPONDING #( lt_import ).
    gt_out_ini = gt_out.

    CALL FUNCTION 'VIEW_GET_DATA'
      EXPORTING
        view_name              = 'V_T001K_ASSIGN'
      TABLES
        data                   = lt_assign
      EXCEPTIONS
        no_viewmaint_tool      = 1
        no_authority           = 2
        no_auth_for_sel        = 3
        data_access_restricted = 4
        no_functiongroup       = 5
        OTHERS                 = 6.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
      FREE: lt_assign.
    ENDIF.

    SELECT * FROM zmm_ariba_ta_01 INTO TABLE lt_ta_01 WHERE action = '01'.
    SELECT * FROM zmm_ariba_ta_03 INTO TABLE lt_ta_03.
    SELECT * FROM zmm_ariba_ta_12 INTO TABLE lt_ta_12.
    SELECT * FROM zmm_consumos    INTO TABLE lt_consumos.

    IF gt_out IS NOT INITIAL.
      LOOP AT gt_out ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<ls_out>).
        CALL FUNCTION 'CONVERSION_EXIT_MATN1_INPUT'
              EXPORTING
                input         = <ls_out>-matnr
              IMPORTING
                output        = <ls_out>-matnr.
      ENDLOOP.

      SELECT matnr matkl prdha
        INTO TABLE lt_matkl_prdha
        FROM mara
         FOR ALL ENTRIES IN gt_out
       WHERE matnr = gt_out-matnr.
    ENDIF.

    FREE: gt_post.
    LOOP AT gt_out INTO gs_out.
      MOVE-CORRESPONDING gs_out TO gs_post.
      gs_post-ernam = sy-uname.
      READ TABLE lt_assign WITH KEY werks = gs_post-werks
                           INTO ls_assign .
      IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
        READ TABLE lt_ta_01 WITH TABLE KEY bukrs = ls_assign-bukrs
                            INTO ls_ta_01.
        IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
          gs_post-bsart = ls_ta_01-bbsrt.
          READ TABLE lt_matkl_prdha WITH TABLE KEY matnr = gs_post-matnr
                                    INTO ls_matkl_prdha.
          IF sy-subrc = 0.
            READ TABLE lt_ta_12 WITH KEY bukrs = ls_assign-bukrs
                                         werks = gs_post-werks
                                         prodh = ls_matkl_prdha-prdha
                                INTO ls_ta_12.
            IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
              gs_post-knttp = ls_ta_12-knttp.
            ELSE.
              READ TABLE lt_ta_12 WITH KEY bukrs = ls_assign-bukrs
                                         prodh = ls_matkl_prdha-prdha
                                INTO ls_ta_12.
              IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
                gs_post-knttp = ls_ta_12-knttp.
              ENDIF.
            ENDIF.
            IF gs_post-knttp = 'K'.
              READ TABLE lt_consumos WITH KEY werks = gs_post-werks
                                              lgort = gs_post-lgort
                                     INTO ls_consumos.
              IF sy-subrc IS INITIAL.
                gs_post-kostl = ls_consumos-kostl_c.
              ENDIF.
              CLEAR gs_post-ekorg. " EXT_DMSF (30/09/02025)
              LOOP AT lt_ta_03 INTO ls_ta_03 WHERE werks = gs_post-werks
                                               AND lgort = gs_post-lgort
                                               AND low_id_cat <= ls_matkl_prdha-matkl
                                               AND high_id_cat >= ls_matkl_prdha-matkl.
                gs_post-ekorg = ls_ta_03-ekorg.
                gs_post-ekgrp = ls_ta_03-ekgrp.
                EXIT.
              ENDLOOP.
              IF gs_post-ekorg IS INITIAL.
                LOOP AT lt_ta_03 INTO ls_ta_03 WHERE werks = gs_post-werks
                                               AND low_id_cat <= ls_matkl_prdha-matkl
                                               AND high_id_cat >= ls_matkl_prdha-matkl.
                  gs_post-ekorg = ls_ta_03-ekorg.
                  gs_post-ekgrp = ls_ta_03-ekgrp.
                  EXIT.
                ENDLOOP.
              ENDIF.
            ENDIF.
          ENDIF.
        ENDIF.
      ENDIF.
      APPEND gs_post TO gt_post.
    ENDLOOP.

  ENDIF.


ENDFORM.

  DATA:
    lt_converted  TYPE  truxs_t_text_data,

      default_file_name         = '*.CSV'
      file_filter               = '*.CSV'
      prompt_on_overwrite       = 'X'

      filename                  = lv_filename
      path                      = lv_path
      fullpath                  = lv_fullpath
    EXCEPTIONS
      cntl_error                = 1
      error_no_gui              = 2
      not_supported_by_gui      = 3
      invalid_default_file_name = 4
      OTHERS                    = 5.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
    FREE: lv_filename , lv_path, lv_fullpath.
  ENDIF.

  IF lv_fullpath IS NOT INITIAL.

    ls_converted = 'C√≥digo do Material;Quantidade;Centro;Dep√≥sito;Data de Remessa;Fornecedor Fixo'.
    APPEND ls_converted TO lt_converted.
    APPEND LINES OF lt_converted1 TO lt_converted.

    CALL FUNCTION 'GUI_DOWNLOAD'
      EXPORTING
*       BIN_FILESIZE            =
        filename                = lv_fullpath
*       FILETYPE                = 'ASC'
      TABLES
        data_tab                = lt_converted
*       FIELDNAMES              =
      EXCEPTIONS
        file_write_error        = 1
        no_batch                = 2
        gui_refuse_filetransfer = 3
        invalid_type            = 4
        no_authority            = 5
        unknown_error           = 6
        header_not_allowed      = 7
        separator_not_allowed   = 8
        filesize_not_allowed    = 9
        header_too_long         = 10
        dp_error_create         = 11
        dp_error_send           = 12
        dp_error_write          = 13
        unknown_dp_error        = 14
        access_denied           = 15
        dp_out_of_memory        = 16
        disk_full               = 17
        dp_timeout              = 18
        file_not_found          = 19
        dataprovider_exception  = 20
        control_flush_error     = 21
        OTHERS                  = 22.
    IF sy-subrc <> 0.
* Implement suitable error handling here
    ENDIF.

  ENDIF.

ENDFORM.

  FREE: ls_out.
*  ls_out-id = lv_new_id.

  DATA:
    gt_out1   TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF zmm_log_st03,
    ls_out    TYPE zmm_log_st03,
    lv_new_id TYPE  zmm_id.


  FREE: gt_out1.
  LOOP AT gt_out INTO ls_out.
    IF sy-tabix = pv_index.
      EXIT.
    ENDIF.
    APPEND ls_out TO gt_out1.
  ENDLOOP.

*  lv_new_id = ls_out-id.
  FREE: ls_out.
*  ls_out-id = lv_new_id.
  APPEND ls_out TO gt_out1.

  LOOP AT gt_out INTO ls_out FROM pv_index.
*    ls_out-id = ls_out-id + 1.
